original_text: My covenant was with him of life and peace; and I gave them to him for the fear wherewith he feared me, and was afraid before my name.
korean_text: 레위와 세운 나의 언약은 생명과 평강의 언약이라 내가 이것을 그에게 준 것은 그로 경외하게 하려 함이라 그가 나를 경외하고 내 이름을 두려워하였으며

sentences.original_text: and I gave them to him
for the fear wherewith he feared me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 경외하는 그 경외함 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and was afraid before my name
